(Simplified: 镘)
Chinese Definition:
①抹牆用的工具，俗稱“抹子”。
②舊時銅錢上沒有鑄字的一面。

鏝字的基本解释

鏝
màn
见“镘”。

鏝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［màn］
［《廣韻》莫半切，去换，明。］
［《廣韻》母官切，平桓，明。］
“镘1”的繁体字。
(1)瓦工抹墙用的抹子。
(2)引申为涂抹、粉刷。
(3)通“幕”。旧时钱背面的字幕。
(4)指钱。

鏝字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鏝； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1320第05
【唐韻】母官切【集韻】【韻會】謨官切，?音瞞。【說文】鐵杇也。與槾同。【廣韻】泥鏝。【爾雅·釋宮】鏝謂之杇。【註】泥鏝。【疏】鏝者泥鏝也。一名杇。塗工之作具也。　又【韻會】亦作墁。【孟子】毀瓦畫墁。　又【揚子·方言】戟，東齊秦晉之閒謂其大者曰鏝胡。【註】卽今雞鳴鉤是也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?莫半切，音縵。同墁。又鏝刀，工人器。

trowel
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［màn］
["Guang Yun" don't cut it in half, change it, Ming. ]
["Guangyun" mother official cut, Pinghuan, Ming. ]
Traditional characters for "镘1".
(1) A trowel used by bricklayers to wipe walls.
(2) The extension is smearing and painting.
(3) Through the "curtain". Subtitles on the back of the old money.
(4) Refers to money.
trowel
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　镘; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1320 05
【Tang Yun】Muguan cut 【Jiyun】【Yunhui】Moguan cut,? Yin concealed. [Said the text] Tie Yao also. Same as Li. [Guangyun] Clay trowel. 【Erya·Shigong】The trowel is called 杇. [Note] Clay trowel. 【Sparse】The trowel is also a mud trowel. One 杇. Painter's tools are also.　[Rhyme Club] is also a maid. [Mencius] Destroy tiles and paintings.　[Yangtze Dialect] halberd, in the Eastern Qi, Qin and Jin dynasties, the one who called it the greatest is called trowel. [Note] This is also the case for the cock.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Mo half cut, Yin Man. The same. And trowel, worker's tool.
